title: Qatar Says AI Demand, Underinvestment May Drive LNG Shortage
description: Qatar’s energy minister said he’s “really worried” a lack of investment and a surge in energy use from AI will create a shortage of LNG and natural gas supplies beyond 2035.
content: Qatar’s energy minister said he’s “really worried” a lack of investment and a surge in energy use from AI will create a shortage of LNG and natural gas supplies beyond 2035.
